Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice: A third-person, action-adventure game with RPG elements set in a fictionalized Japan, featuring intense sword combat and stealth.
Dark Souls III: An action RPG with punishing difficulty, intricate level design, and rich lore in a dark medieval fantasy world.
Elden Ring: A vast open-world action RPG created by FromSoftware and George R.R. Martin, filled with freedom of exploration and challenging encounters.
Nioh: A samurai action RPG set in a dark fantasy version of Japan's Sengoku period, mixing challenging combat with supernatural foes.
Bloodborne: A Gothic, Victorian-era inspired action RPG where players battle horrific beasts in a cursed city, focusing on aggressive combat.
God of War: A story-driven action-adventure game following Kratos and his son, set in the world of Norse mythology, blending narrative and combat.
Horizon: Forbidden West: A post-apocalyptic action RPG with a lush open world, mechanical creatures, and a rich narrative.
Killing God: Hu Sun: An upcoming action RPG inspired by the Chinese classic Journey to the West, featuring dynamic combat, stunning visuals, and mythical creatures.
